description:
Hikari finally gets a chance to be on a "date" with Amane. However Kaname and Momomi again try to tear apart the new bond between them for the sake of Spica`s bid at the ...toile position. In the midst of all this Yaya`s feelings for Hikari grow even stronger and she eventually vents them by suddenly kissing a shocked Hikari.
Source: crunchyroll
